objects.specification: The floor is finished in a smooth light pastel matte surface that reflects ambient light softly, creating a bright and welcoming classroom base. It has a subtle texture for slip resistance and is uniform in color to visually expand the room.
A smooth white matte wall surface with clean right angles and consistent thickness, providing a neutral backdrop for teaching tools and decor.
A smooth white matte wall surface with clean right angles and consistent thickness, providing a neutral backdrop for teaching tools and decor.
A smooth white matte wall surface with clean right angles and consistent thickness, providing a neutral backdrop for teaching tools and decor.
A smooth white matte wall surface with clean right angles and consistent thickness, providing a neutral backdrop for teaching tools and decor.

A large teacher’s desk crafted from darker wood tones with a polished surface, featuring a thick top, robust legs, and integrated modesty panel. The style is dignified and sturdy, sized for front-of-room presentation and storage.

An ergonomic teacher chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in dark neutral fabric, mounted on a sturdy frame. The backrest is slightly contoured and the legs match the darker wood tone of the desk.
A large wall-mounted whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface framed in slim anodized aluminum, providing a clear, reflective backdrop for markers.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in white matte housing with a front lens assembly and ventilation grilles, designed for crisp projection onto the whiteboard.
A tall bookshelf constructed of warm medium wood tones with five evenly spaced shelves, each filled with colorful textbook spines and decorative storage boxes.
Light pastel fabric curtains with a subtle vertical texture, softly draping to each side of the window opening and mounted on a slender rod.
A simple student desk with a light wood-toned rectangular laminate top and slender metal legs in a neutral hue, featuring rounded edges and a minimal modesty panel beneath.
